metadata.title: CVE-2015-1306 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The newsletter posting area in the web interface in Sympa 6.0.x before6.0.10 and 6.1.x before 6.1.24 allows remote attackers to read arbitraryfiles via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: sympa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
